title: I can't open League of Legends Dmg file
body: Ive been playing League of Legends for Two years now and recently one of my friends removed the application from my computer. So when I eventually came back around to download the game again I noticed that after I clicked the file it wouldnt open. I wanna play the game again but Im not sure how, I play on a older mac so if anyone could help me that would be nice

replies.body: Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) should be able to help!  Use the clean reinstall to get rid of these bad files, and replace your game data with some good files.  I hope that helps, but let me know if you have any questions.
I tried to open up the Dmg file with the hextech repair tool and I still cannot open the file.
I am having the same issue. Riot help! D':
